It took forever to load the pictures! It has been one month now since I bought this HP Chromebook 11 (white/yellow), still hating it. I'm glad this is not my primary computer. Another thing, after two weeks of irregular use of this laptop, charging it is a headache! It would not hold a charge, its hard to find the angle to where it is charging. I don't know if the laptop is the problem or the charger. I regret of buying this laptop. And I would not recommend to any of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Can't open files.
Reviews.Author: dky
Reviews.Content: Other than the fact it can't open a lot of different files, it works fine. My problem is videos and files I want to open it does not support so I have to download an app that coverts it to a format that Chrome recognizes. All of these files and videos works fine with Windows. I think my final frustration was when I needed to install some software and of course it did not recognize it  so I did the conversion using the converter that Chrome tech guys recommended and it still says does not support that format. I think if you use it  to read your emails and read some news it works just fine.I am selling mine and getting a window based note book.

Reviews.Title: I Hope You Are Very Tech Savvy
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Chromebook in October as a Christmas gift for my wife.  An e-mail arrived shortly after instructing me not to use the charger and that they would provide a new one in about six weeks. As promised, It arrived- problem solved.  We were tickled to death with the light weight (my wife's number one request).  It worked fine for about one month, and then we began to have problems with WiFi connectivity. Note: A pretty big blog on the Internet around this issue.  I guess I assumed that there was Tech Support- There is Not!  You are on your own.My wife does not use any Windows Office products( Outlook, etc).  Her only desire is to read e-mail and log in to Facebook.  She hates virtual keys.  This seemed ideal until our current WiFi issues  - Stuck with a Lemon

Reviews.Title: Do not buy a chromebook
Reviews.Author: Morwin Schmookler
Reviews.Content: Google Chromebook provides no way of contacting them when there is a problem with their products. Hence now they sent us defective chargers and mine never worked properly from the beginning I am sitting for weeks without a computer that works.The computer is ok, but not worth the price considering what laptops cost now. Definitely not worth it when you consider they make any issue with their product a living hell. I must recommend not to buy this product.

Reviews.Title: Not a gamer
Reviews.Author: wonderingeve
Reviews.Content: I like face book games.  Cannot play a simple game because the page strolls loosely.  I do not recommend this chrome book.  If you are a music lover  and like your own disk to play forget it; you will not have this either.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BY ANYTHING WITH CHROME OS
Reviews.Author: Jorge E. Heguilor
Reviews.Content: If all you do is Facebook and Twitter, then this toy is cheap, but if you try to use Itunes, Skype, Photoshop or ANY program that Google doesn't provide (like the one that comes with your expensive camera) you are s..t out of luck.  Plus external monitors or TV connect badly if at all (mine has not worked for 5 days) and Customer Service means to send to talk to people who could be speaking Japanese for all I know: "Did you mangloo the HEOD BEFORE or after squaggling the trooger?"As much as I hated Microsoft over the years, I have never been treated so badly, and no problem has lasted for five days.  Never more Crome.

Reviews.Title: I want my money back
Reviews.Author: Khaled Aly
Reviews.Content: I can't even use it because it doesn't connect to my university's wifi as my university requires downloading a certificate. Whenever I get to the "visit the network's sign-in page" it says no connection available and doesn't even allow me to type any web address. I seriously want a full refund and I am ready to ship that piece of cr*p back.

Reviews.Title: Bi-lingual keyboard
Reviews.Author: Fatekh Vergasov
Reviews.Content: U.S.A. is country of immigrants... Why computer maker cannot make custom Bi or three lingual keyboard??? Why should customer glue stupid stickers over each keyboard key???

Reviews.Title: Not for device but for Amazon
Reviews.Author: 2redheads
Reviews.Content: I love Chromebooks and I am a Google Certified Trainer so I knew what I was buying ... or so it would seem.  The package had clearly been opened before and returned (not one security tape was in tact, no plastic packaging inside, and powercord had "HP Chromebook" hand written in silver sharpie on it).  I bought as new sold by and fulfilled by Amazon.  I was offered refund upon my return of the item because it was now "out of stock" and advised to repurchase from 3rd party seller for $75+ more dollars ... shame on you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: doesnt support Windows
Reviews.Author: jalisa
Reviews.Content: Its cute, nice size, and good for searching and communicating maybe but not good enough to work on. Doesnt support windows
